name: Frogger 2: Swampy's Revenge
description:
Frogger 2: Swampy's Revenge is an action-arcade game developed by Blitz Games. It came out on 01-09-2000. It was published by Hasbro Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Frogger 2: Swampy's Revenge on PlayStation, Game Boy Color, Dreamcast and PC.
It was scored by Andrew Morris.
